element-citation.article-title: The genome of cultivated sweet potato contains Agrobacterium T-DNAs with expressed genes: an example of a naturally transgenic food crop
element-citation.source: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A

note.p: This paper demonstrated the presence of Agrobacterium-derived transgenes occurring naturally in a major crop species, and suggested that it may have contributed to crop domestication. This discovery raises questions around the rationale of some of the current regulatory requirements for transgenic plants.
